item.title: How Do I Take Care of a Hedgehog?
item.description: Are Hedgehogs Difficult To Take Care Of? Hedgehogs aren’t difficult to take care of. They’re just…different. Their prickly quills make care and feeding seem daunting but, the more you handle and care for your hedgehog, the friendlier they get! (This is called socialization.) What Should I Expect From My Hedgehog? When hedgehogs first come home from their breeder, they may seem nervous, or hide a lot. This is perfectly normal! Many hedgehog breeders have guides explaining what to expect from your new hedgehog companion.

item.title: Are Hedgehogs Legal Near Me?
item.description: How Do I Know if Hedgehogs Are Legal? If you’re reading this from New England, then you’re all set, because hedgehogs are legal everywhere in New England. Unfortunately, other regions aren’t so lucky, and some states have it out for these lovable little prickleballs! A Southern New Hampshire-based hedgehog breeder has a great resource outlining everywhere in the United States where hedgehogs are legal and illegal: Are Hedgehogs Legal in My State?
